div.select: { let $users := collection(conf:param('xrx-user-db-base-uri'))//*:user for $user in $users return let $lastname := $user//*:name let $firstname := $user//*:firstname let $usermail := $user//*:email return if(fn:compare($xrx:user-id, $usermail)!=0) then {$lastname/text()}, {$firstname/text()} ({xmldb:decode($usermail/text())}) else() }

div.div:
{ let $cropelements := doc(concat(conf:param('xrx-user-db-base-uri'), '/', xmldb:encode($xrx:user-id), '.xml'))//*:cropelement for $cropelement at $number in $cropelements return let $name := string($cropelement/@*:name) let $type := string($cropelement/@*:type) let $idno := string($cropelement/@*:id) return
type Type : {$type}
tag:www.monasterium.net,2011:/mom/resource/image/button_edit
save Save
name Name : {string($name)}
tag:www.monasterium.net,2011:/mom/resource/image/button_edit
save Save
{ let $datas := $cropelement//*:data return for $data in $datas return
image-name Imagename : {string($data/@*:imagename)}
tag:www.monasterium.net,2011:/mom/resource/image/button_edit
save Save
charter Charter :
{xmldb:decode(substring-before(substring-after(substring-after(substring-after(substring-after($data/*:url, '/'), '/'), '/'), '/'), '/charter'))}
note Note : {$data/*:note}
tag:www.monasterium.net,2011:/mom/resource/image/button_edit
save Save
{ if($data/@*:status != 'wait')then
moderator
tag:www.monasterium.net,2011:/mom/resource/image/move-to
tag:www.monasterium.net,2011:/mom/resource/image/remove
tag:www.monasterium.net,2011:/mom/resource/image/export
tag:www.monasterium.net,2011:/mom/resource/image/mail
tag:www.monasterium.net,2011:/mom/resource/image/move-to
tag:www.monasterium.net,2011:/mom/resource/image/remove
tag:www.monasterium.net,2011:/mom/resource/image/export
tag:www.monasterium.net,2011:/mom/resource/image/mail
else
Wait for release!
}
}
}

Please select a collection in the left Dropdown- list!
Please select an collection in the right Dropdown- list!
Use the arrow- buttons beside the viewports to switch trough a collection of annotation images and use the buttons below the viewports to load the images into the editor!

div.div:
reached-last-undo-step Reached last undo step!
data-not-deleted Error! Data have not been deleted! select-user
data-and-colletcion-deleted Data and Collection have been successful deleted!
delete-image-question Do you really want to delete this image?
select-image-in-drop-down Please select an image in the drop-down list to save it!
insert-type-or-name Please insert a type or name into the input fields!
select-type-or-name Please select a type and a name!
loaded-to-right-viewport You already loaded this image to the editor! Please select another one or use the right 'compare viewport'!
loaded-to-left-viewport You already loaded this image to the editor! Please select another one or use the left 'compare viewport'!
select-image-to-adjust-changes Please select an image in the drop-down list to adjust the changes!
select-user Please select an user in the drop-down list to send the image!
send-to-user Image has been send to User:
wait-for-release Wait for release!
saved-to-user-collection Collection has been saved to user collections!
